ProjectTitle: Management of (gestational) diabetes in pregnancy: new insights in predictors, complications, technology, and prevention of the long-term metabolic risk postpartum
InitialFeedbackHistory:
10/12/2024
Ethics: Please list the ethical approval number (S number) of your project
Metadata: Metadata is often generated by instruments, will metadata be added to the lab analyzes or glucose monitoring? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage: there are many different storage solutions a KU Leuven (and UZ Leuven), the storage guide can help you choose: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en, or contact your local IT team for advice. 
Sharing: Please check the answer under "if access is restricted......"  this is not consistent with the other information in your DMP. 
Only share your data open if it is fully anonymous, if there is still a (small) possibility to reidentify the participants you please apply access restrictions in RDR so interested researchers will have to submit a request to access the files. Also note that RDR will assign a DOI to your dataset upon deposit.
label: good with suggestions
